Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1981...
Injured on 6/16/1982 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Traded from San Francisco to Baltimore on 7/31/1982 (Going to SF: 1B B. Horner. Going to BAL: 3B H. Matsunaga, CF M. Jordan)...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1984, off Joe Sambito (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/10/1984, off Mike Flanagan (OAK)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1984, hitting .542 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1984, hitting .294 with 12 HR, 75 RBI...
Injured on 6/9/1986 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1986, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1986, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
